titleStmt.title: Episcopall inheritance, or, A reply to the humble examination of a printed abstract of the answers to nine reasons of the Hovse of Commons against the votes of bishops in Parliament also a determination of the learned and reverend bishop of Sarum Englished.
titleStmt.author: Langbaine, Gerard, 1609-1658.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Gerard Langbaine. cf. BLC.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
